content.question: According to the passage, which of the following occurred as a direct result of the congressional resolution authorizing action against al-Qaeda?

choices.label: The Supreme Court authorized the use of force against al-Qaeda.
President Bush interpreted it broadly to allow him to conduct the war on terrorism without much further consultation with Congress.
Members of Congress passed a law that declared that the Geneva Conventions were not applicable to the war on terrorism.
President Bush issued a signing statement regarding the Geneva Conventions.

content.answer: President Bush interpreted it broadly to allow him to conduct the war on terrorism without much further consultation with Congress.
